# Description

`electionData` is used to make a data frame of election data of 2014.

## Usage

electionData(kommun,path)

## Arguments
* kommun - Municipality (or municipalitys in vector).
* path - Directory to the "resultat"-folder.

# Get a data frame

`electionData(c("0136", "0140"), ".../Downloads/slutresultat")`

## Municipality codes

`\url{http://www.scb.se/Grupp/Hitta_statistik/Regional\%20statistik/Indelningar/_Dokument/kommunlankod.pdf}`
